content:
What a wonderful idea! A meditation app subscription can be a great complement to the meditation cushion gift, providing your friend with a wealth of guided meditations and tracking features to support their practice.

There are many excellent meditation apps out there, but here are some popular ones that offer guided meditations and progress tracking:

1. **Headspace**: A well-known app with a gentle, approachable approach to meditation. It offers personalized meditation plans, guided sessions, and tracking features to monitor progress. (Free trial, then $12.99/month or $94.99/year)
2. **Calm**: Another popular app with a wide range of guided meditations, sleep stories, and relaxing music. It also features a "Daily Calm" program with new content added daily. (Free trial, then $14.99/month or $69.99/year)
3. **Insight Timer**: A free app with a vast library of guided meditations, as well as a timer for tracking personal practice. It also features a large community of users and a wide range of meditation topics. (Free, with optional in-app purchases)
4. **Meditation Studio**: An app offering a variety of guided meditations, including those specifically designed for stress, sleep, and focus. It also tracks progress and provides personalized recommendations. (Free trial, then $7.99/month or $49.99/year)
5. **Buddhify**: A unique app that offers guided meditations for different parts of your day, such as waking up, going to bed, or taking a break at work. It also tracks progress and provides personalized recommendations. (Free trial, then $2.99/month or $29.99/year)
6. **10% Happier**: An app that focuses on mindfulness and meditation for skeptics, with guided sessions and personalized coaching. It also tracks progress and provides feedback. (Free trial, then $9.99/month or $79.99/year)

These apps are all available for both iOS and Android devices, and many offer free trials or introductory periods, so your friend can try them out before committing to a subscription.

When choosing an app, consider your friend's meditation goals, preferred meditation style, and the features that are most important to them. You could even ask them about their preferences or try out a few apps together to find the best fit.
